Package org.epochx.tools.grammar

Interface Summary
GrammarNode Instances of GrammarNode implementations are the elements that represent the set of rules that make up a Grammar.
Symbol A node of a parse tree that was constructed to satisfy a grammar.
 

Class Summary
Grammar A grammar object is constructed from a BNF language grammar.
GrammarLiteral Grammar literals are a type of grammar node, that represent the terminals of a grammar.
GrammarProduction One of potentially multiple options that a GrammarRule can resolve to.
GrammarRule A GrammarRule is a component of a grammar parse tree that matches a rule of a BNF language grammar.
NonTerminalSymbol A non-terminal node of a parse tree, that was constructed to satisfy a specific rule of a grammar.
TerminalSymbol A terminal node of a parse tree, that was constructed to represent a specific instantiation of a GrammarLiteral of a grammar.
 

Exception Summary
MalformedGrammarException A runtime exception that is thrown to indicate that a grammar string is not in a valid BNF format.
